Post.title: nodepath.joinpath.resolve
Post._content:
<meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer">

####  path.join([path1][, path2][, ...])
**`path.join()`**

path.join()stringstring
```javascript
// 
const path = require('path'); 
path.join('https://', 'www.', 'aaa', '.com', '/','aaa') 
'https://www.aaa.com/aaa' 

// 
path.join('aaa',{},'bbb') 
//  TypeError: Arguments to path.join must be strings'
```

#### path.resolve([from ...], to)
**path.resolve()**
cdresolve
```javascript
path.resolve('foo/bar', '/tmp/file/', '..', 'a/../truefile')
```

```javascript
cd foo/bar
cd /tmp/file/
cd ..
cd a/../truefile
pwd
```

```javascript
path.resolve('/foo/bar', './baz') 
//  '/foo/bar/baz' 
path.resolve('/foo/bar', '/tmp/file/') 
//  '/tmp/file' 

path.resolve(__dirname, 'static_files/png/', '../gif/image.gif') 
//  /home/itbilu/node 
// '/home/itbilu/node/wwwroot/static_files/gif/image.gif'

```

## 
babel


```javascript
{
	preset: [
		"@babel/preset-env",
		{
			target: {
				edge: 17,
				firefox: 60,
				safari: 111
			}
		},
		{ useBuiltIns: "usage" },
	]
}
```
### 1. preset
+ **@babel/preset-env  ES2015+ **
+ **@babel/preset-typescript for TypeScript tsts-loader**
+ **@babel/preset-react for React**
#### preset
presets****
```javascript
{
  "presets": ["@babel/preset-env"]
}
```

### 2. target
`targets` 
+ ` android, chrome, deno, edge, electron, firefox, ie, ios, node, opera, rhino, safari, samsung`
+ `string`` > 0.5%`,` last 2 versions, not dead` 

### 3. useBuildIns
***useBuildInscorejs***
```javascript
npm i core-js -S
```

```javascript
{ useBuiltIns: "usage" },
```
+ `false` 
+ `usage`Babel targets polyfill 
+ entrypolyfill` import "core-js/stable"` 

### 4. corejs
corejs

babeles6`promise``async/await`corejs
`babel-polyfill`7.4

Post.title: AMDCommonJS
Post._content:
<meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer">

## AMD
### 

AMDrequirejs
### 
#### 1. 
AMDdefine

```javascript
define(id?: string,dependencies?: string[],factory: Function | object)
```

**`id`**: 

**`dependencies`**: `dependencies``["require", "exports", "module"]`

```javascript
define(function(require, exports, module) {}
```

**`factory`**: 

#### 2. 

`require`
```javascript
require([
	"moduleA",
	"moduleB",
	function (m1, m2) {
		// m1m2
	}
]);
```

#### 
`requirejs`

##### 1. 
![image.png](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/20892169-a1c46888e1da89da.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

##### 2. index.htmlrequirejsdata-main

```javascript
<script
	src="./require.js"
	data-main="js/main.js"></script>
```
##### 3. moduleAmoduleB
moduleA.js
```javascript
define(function () {
	function logStr(str) {
		console.log(str);
	}
	return { logStr };
// return
// define,require
});

```
moduleB.js
```javascript
define(["component/moduleA"], function (moduleA) {
// functionmoduleAfunction
// moduleA
	moduleA.logStr("moduleAmoduleB");
	function logNum(num) {
		console.log(num);
	}
	return { logNum };
});
```
main.js
```javascript
require(["component/moduleB"], function (moduleB) {
	console.log("ModuleBmain");
	moduleB.logNum(2);
});
```
require.config
```javascript
require.config({
	paths: {
		moduleB: "./component/moduleB"
	}
});
require(["moduleB"], function (moduleB) {
	console.log("ModuleBmain");
	moduleB.logNum(2);
});

```

##### 
![](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/20892169-02f2299da74151fd.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)


## CommonJS

CommonJS  JavaScript nodejs

### 

```javascript
// moduleA.js
module.exports = function( value ){
    return value * 2;
}
```

```javascript
// moduleB.js
var multiplyBy2 = require('./moduleA');
var result = multiplyBy2(4);
```

CommonJS `id`[require1k](https://github.com/Stuk/require1k)[tiny-browser-require](https://github.com/ruanyf/tiny-browser-require)resolve

 CommonJS [http://wiki.commonjs.org/wiki/CommonJS](http://wiki.commonjs.org/wiki/CommonJS)

CommonJSAMD

Post.title: ES6
Post._content:
<meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer">

## export
### 1. 

```javascript
export var firstName = 'Michael';
export var lastName = 'kaol';
export var age = '10'
```


```javascript
var firstName = 'Michael';
var lastName = 'kaol';
var age = '10'
export {firstName,lastName,age};
```

### 2. export

```javascript
export function fun() {
  return 'fun'
}  // fun
```

### 3. as

```javascript
function v1() { ... }

Post.title: Proxy
Post._content:
<meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer">

## proxy
proxymonitor
```javascript
{
    let obj = {
        time: '2017-03-11',
        name: 'net',
        _r: 123
    }
```
### 1. proxy
#### 1handler
```javascript
        let proxy = new Proxy(obj,handler)
        handler = {
             get () {},
             set () {},
             has () {},
         }
```
#### 2
```javascript
	let proxy = new Proxy(obj,{
		get (target,key) {} // or get: function(target,key) {}
	})
```
## 2. get/set/has/
```javascript
    let monitor = new Proxy(obj,{
   //2. get
        get (target,key) {
            if(target[key].replace)
                return target[key].replace('2017','2018')
            else 
                return target[key]
            // return
        },
        set (target,key,value) {
    // 3. set
            if(key === 'name') {
                return target[key] == value
            }
        },
    // 4. hasin hasOwnProperty()
    // hasOwnProperty():keykey,
    // in: key in obj //obj key
        has (target,key) {
            if (key == '_r') {
                return false
            } else {
                return key in target
            }
        }
    // 5. construct() new
    // 6. deleteProperty() delete
    // 7. defineProperty() Object.defineProperty()
    // 8. ownKeys(target) Object.getOwnPropertyNames(proxy)Object.getOwnPropertySymbols(proxy)Object.keys(proxy)for...inObject.keys()
    // 9. apply(target, object, args) Proxy proxy(...args)proxy.call(object, ...args)proxy.apply(...)
    })

    console.log(monitor.time) // 2018-03-11
    monitor._r = 'sdffsfsdfds'
    console.log(monitor._r)
    monitor.name = 'sdffsfsdfds'
    console.log(monitor.name)
    console.log('name' in monitor) // true
    console.log('_r' in monitor) // false
    console.log('_r' in monitor) // false
}
```
##  reflect
#### 1 proxy
#### 2 ES6  Object  Reflect  Object  Reflect  Reflect 
#### 3 Reflect 
#### 4 Reflect  Object

{
    let obj = {
        time: '2017-03-11',
        name: 'net',
        _r: 123
    }

}

Reflect.get(obj,'name')  // 'net'
```

classclass
```javascript
  function _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }

  function _defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } }

  function _createClass(Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) _defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) _defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }

```
@babel/runtimerequire
```javascript
  var _classCallCheck = require("@babel/runtime/helpers/classCallCheck");
  var _defineProperties = require("@babel/runtime/helpers/defineProperties");
  var _createClass = require("@babel/runtime/helpers/createClass");
```

Post.title: vuevue2vue3
Post._content:
## Object.defineProperty(obj, prop, descriptor) jsdefineProperty #### ```javascript var obj = new Object(); var value; Object.defineProperty(obj,'name',{ get: function () { console.log(`get${obj['name']} `); return value;//returnname }, set: function (newvalue) { console.log('set it'); value = newvalue;//value } }); console.log(obj); console.log(obj.name);//get it obj.name = aaaaa;//set it console.log(obj.name);//get it ``` #### vue2defineProperty htmldom ```javascript
``` ```javascript function observe(target) { if (typeof target !== "null" && typeof target !== "object") { return target; } for (let key in target) { defineReactive(target, key, target[key]); } } ``` ```javascript function defineReactive(target, key, value) { observe(value); // Object.defineProperty(target, key, { get() { return value; }, set(newValue) { if (value !== newValue) { value = newValue; updateView(JSON.stringify(target)); } else { console.log("value == newValue"); } } }); } ``` ```javascript function updateView(value) { document.querySelector(".wrapper").innerText = value; } let serveObj = { name: "aaaccc", age: 11, other: { sex: "f" } }; ``` ```javascript observe(serveObj); serveObj.name = "sdfdsfsdfsd" // dominnerHtml ``` ## proxy proxy #### ```javascript let obj = { a: 1 }; let proxy = new Proxy(obj, { get(target, key) { return target[key]; }, set(target, key, value, proxy) { target[key] = value; document.querySelector(".wrapper").innerText = JSON.stringify(proxy); } }); proxy.b = 1; obj // {a: 1, b: 1} ```

## ajax ```js // ajax let data = { name: '', age: '12' } let url = './sendmsg' let xml = new XMLHttpRequest() xml.onreadystatechange = function(xhr) { if(xhr.readyState == 4) { // readyState0-->send 1-->send() 2-->send()3--> if(xhr.state == 200) { console.log(xhr.responseText) } } } // ``` promise ajax ```js // promise ajax function ajax(url,data){ return new Promise((res,rej)=>{ let xml = new XMLHttpRequest() xml.onreadystatechange = function(xhr){ if(xhr.readyState == 4) { if(xhr.state == 200) { res({url,data}) } else { rej() } } else { rej() } } xml.open('POST',url,true) xml.send(data) }) } ajax(url,data).then(({url,data})=>{ }) ``` #### ###### 1. ajax ###### 2. imglinkscript img link script cdncdn scriptjsonp ###### 3. jsonp **scriptjsonp**
http://localhost:8081http://localhost:8082 1js http://localhost:8082/index.jscallback ```js callback({ name: '', age: 12 }) ``` 2scriptindex ```js ``` callbackscriptwindow
3script ```js window.callback = function(data){ // datacallback { name: '', age: 12 } } ``` ###### 4. cors CORS header header ![](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/20892169-efbefcbd891c78b8.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240) ###### 5. ajax fetch() axios

## generator
```javascript
function* generator(a) {
    yield console.log(a);
    let b = 111+222;
    yield a+b;
    let d = yield 765+3
    console.log(`d=${d}`)
    return 1234567
}
let gen = generator(333)
gen.next() // value:333,done:false,
gen.next() // value:666,done:false
gen.next() // value:768,done:false
gen.next(123) // d = 123 value:1234567(return1234567returnundefined),done:true
//next()yield
```
**1. for...ofgeneratoriteratornext()**
```javascript
function* foo() {
    yield 1;
    yield 2;
    yield 3;
    yield 4;
    yield 5;
}

for(let v of foo()) {
    console.log(v)
}
// 1 2 3 4 5 
```

**3. g.throw(err) generator**
**4. g.return() generator**
**5. yield\* gen() generatorgeneratoryield\***
**6. generatorgeneratoriterator**
```javascript
let obj = {
    fun:function() {

    },
    fun1: function* () {

    }
}
// 
let obj = {
    fun () {

    },
    *fun1 () {

    }
}
```

## asyncawait
** async async`promise`promise**
** await`promise.then()``promise`async**

#### 1. async/awaitPromiseasync
 async/awaitasync/awaitpromise
promise.then promise.catch
promisepromise.catchtry...catchasync/await
 ```javascript
async function fn1 () {
    let a = Promise.reject(100)
    // Uncaught (in promise) 100
    const res = await a 
// awaitpromise.then
// Promise.reject(100).then(()=>{})reject
    console.log(res)  
}
fn1() // Uncaught (in promise) 100
```

```javascript
async function fn1 () {
    let a = Promise.reject(100)
    // Uncaught (in promise) 100
    try{
        const res = await a // awaitpromise.thenreject
        console.log(res)  
    }
    catch(e) {
        console.log(`e=${e}`) // e=100
    }
}
fn1() // e=100
```

#### 2. asyncpromise.thenawaitpromise.then()
asyncreturn***then***
asyncasync Promise then
await promiseasync promise.then()
async  Promise **await Promise return****asyncthen**
```javascript
async function fn1 () {
    return 100 //  return Promise.resolve(100)
}
fn1 == 100 // falseasyncpromisepromise.resolve(100)
fn1().then((n)=>{ // asyncpromisethen
    console.log(`n=${n}`) // 100
})
```
#### 3. await Promise  Promise asyncreturnpromise
```javascript
async function fn1 () {
    let a = await 100 // await Promise  Promise 
   // a.then()
   // awaitpromisepromise
    console.log(a) // 100
}
```
```javascript
// awaitthen
async function fna() {
    let a = await Promise.resolve(100) 
// Promise.resolve(100).then()then
// then100a100
}
```

### 4. awaitpromiseasyncawait
```javascript
function timeout(ms) {
    return new Promise((resolve) => {
      console.log('resolve=',resolve)
      setTimeout(()=>{resolve(100)}, ms);
    });
  }
  
  async function asyncPrint(value, ms) {
    let a = await timeout(ms);
    console.log('a='+a)
    console.log(value);
  }  //a =100
```

###5. asynccatchpromise.catch()
```
async function fn1() {
    try {
        const p4 = Promise.reject('err1')
        const res = await p4
        console.log(res)
    }
    catch(err) {
        console.log(err)
    }
}
fn1() // err1
```
### awaitpromisereject
```javascript
async function fn1() {
    const p4 = Promise.reject('err1')
    const res = await p4
    console.log(res)
}
fn1() // Uncaught (in promise) err1
//  try catch
```

### 5.event-loop
async/awaitevent-loop
await event-loop
```javascript
async function fn1() {
    console.log(1)
    await console.log(2)

        await console.log(3)

            await setTimeout(()=>{console.log(4)},3000)
            console.log(5)

                await console.log(6)
                console.log(7)
}
fn1() 
console.log(8) // 1 2 8 3 5 6 7 4
// fn1() 
// console.log(1)
// console.log(2)
//  await ,await
// console.log(8)
// await
// console.log(3)
//  await
// await
// setTimeout(()=>{console.log(3)},3000) 
// await await
// console.log(5)
// console.log(6)
// await
// console.log(7)
```

### 6.awaitpromise
promise
```
 function timeout(ms) {
    return new Promise((resolve) => {
      setTimeout(resolve, ms);
    });
  }
  
  async function asyncPrint(value, ms) {
    await timeout(ms);
    console.log(value);
  }
  
  asyncPrint('hello world', 5000);
  console.log(1)
// 15hello world
// promise1valuevalue
// promise1value

//  new Promise,promise
// .then.catchmicro task queue
```
```javascript
function timeout(ms) {
    return setTimeout(()=>{}, ms);
  }
  
  async function asyncPrint(value, ms) {
    await timeout(ms);
    console.log(value);
  }
  asyncPrint('hello world', 5000);
  console.log(1)
// 1 hello world

```javascript
let fullname = {
    getFullName (city,country) {
        return this.firstname+this.lastname+'from'+country+city
    }
}
let name = {
    firstname: 'bai',
    lastname:'xue'
}
```
###### bind
```javascript
let fullnamestring = fullname.getFullName.bind(name,'','')
fullnamestring() //'baixuefrom'
```
###### call
```
let fullnamestring = fullname.getFullName.call(name,'','') //'baixuefrom'
```
###### apply
```
let fullnamestring = fullname.getFullName.apply(name,['','']) //'baixuefrom'
```

## dom ## ##### ```javascript event.stopPropagation() // event.preventDefault() // // a // // submit event.target // event.target.dataset // data-xxx
event.target.dataset.a == 1 event.currentTarget // event.target.matches(selector) --> // id ``` ##### xxx.addEventListener('xxx',function(){},true) true ## ## #### ```javascript function bindEvent(element,eventType,selector,fn) { if(fn == null) { // fn fn = selector selector = null } element.addEventListener(eventType,e => { let target = e.target if (selector) { if (target.matches(selector)) { fn.call(target,e) } } else { // // window.fn.call(target,e) callcallfntarget.fn fn.call(target,e) // callbindEventwindowthiswindowthisaddEventListenerevent } }) } ``` ```javascript // selector function bindEvent(element,eventType,fn,selector) { element.addEventListener(eventType,(event)=>{ let target = event.target if(selector) { if(target.matches(selector)) { fn.call(target,event) } } else { fn.call(target,event) } }) } let btn = document.querySelector('btn') bindEvent(btn,'click','child_div',function(e){ e.preventDefault() alert(this.innerHTML) }) ```

## dom #### dom htmlxmlhtmlxml dom ![](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/20892169-2583ad059ce41ddb.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240) #### 1. document ###### 1document >all[] anchors[]hrefnameweb appletsapplets forms[]forms images[]img links[]areahrefhref ###### 2document ``` cookie domain 'www.baidu.com' lastModified referrer"" URL'https://www.baidu.com/from=844b/s?word=sdfsdf' title URLurllocation.hrefURLlocation.href ``` ###### 3document ``` document.querySelector() document.getElementById() document.getElementsByName() document.getElementsByClassname() document.getElementsByTagName() document.createElement() document.createTextNode() document.createAttribute() document.open() ``` #### 2. document.element ###### 1 ``` element.getElementsByTagName() element.appendChild() element.insertBefore() element.cloneNode(deep) deep true false element.hasChildNodes() true element.normalize() element.replaceChild(newchild,oldchild) newchildoldchlid element.removeChild(node) node ``` ###### 2 ``` element.attributes // element.getAttribute() // a.getAttribute('href')--->abc element.getAttributeNode(name) let atr = document.querySelector('a').getAttributeNode('href') // a.getAttribute('href')--->href = 'abc' a.getAttribute('href').value ---> abc a.getAttribute('href').name--->href element.hasAttribute(name) // true false element.hasAttributes() // true false element.setAttribute(name,value) a.setAttribute('href','http://xxx.cn') element.setAttributeNode()//attribute /* // let div = document.createElement('div') let attr = document.createAttribute('attr') attr.value = '1' div.setAttributeNode(attr) div //
*/ let newAtrNode = document.createAttribute('class') newAtrNode.nodeValue='abc' newNode.setAttributeNode(newAtrNode) element.removeAttribute(name) element.removeAttributeNode() // let atr = document.querySelector('a').getAttributeNode('href') document.querySelector('a').removeAttribute(atr) element.style.xxx (style = "??????") element.className ``` ###### 3 ``` element.childNodes nodelists element.className element.innerHTML element.id element.firstChild element.lastChild element.firstElementChild element.lastElementChild element.nodeType 1 2 3 8 element.nodeValue nodeValue undefined null nodeValue nodeValue element.nextSibling element.previousSibling element.innerHTML element.innerText element.clientHeight element.clientWidth element.offsetWidth element.offsetHeight element.offsetTop element.offsetLeft // / element.scrollTop element.scrollLeft // / element.offsetParent div ``` ![](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/20892169-dd392939dc6498e4.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240) #### 3.attribute ``` attr.isId idtruefalse attr.name btn.attributes[0].name attr.value btn.attributes[0].value nodemapelement.attributes ~ nodemap.getNamedItem() // // nodemap.item(num) // nodemap nodemap.length // nodemap nodemap.removeNamedItem(num) // nodemap.setNamedItem() // // var btn=document.getElementsByTagName("h1")[0]; // var typ=document.createAttribute("class"); // typ.nodeValue="democlass"; // btn.attributes.setNamedItem(typ); ``` #### 4.event ###### 1 ``` document.querySelector('body').addEventListener('click',()=>{ alert(1) }) ``` ###### 2 ``` onabort onreset onselect onunload onchange (input textarea) onkeydown onkeypress onkeyup onload onmousedown onmousemove onmouseout onmouseover onmouseup // altKey ctrlKey metaKey shiftKey clientX clientY screenX screenY clientX clientY // currentTarget target type( Event ) // preventDefault() stopPropagation() // addEventListenerfalse true ``` #### bom 1window ###### history back()forward()go(n) ###### location http://localhost:8080/axiospage?name=aaa&age=12#abc ``` hash(#) //'#abc' host // localhost:8080 hostname //localhost href //'http://localhost:8080/axiospage?name=aaa&age=12#abc' pathname#?'/axiospage' port //'8080' protocol //'http:' search(?) //'?name=aaa&age=12' assign(url)urlhref reload()truefalse replace(newUrl) () ``` ###### Navigator NavigatoruserAgent user-agent ###### ``` pageXOffsetpageYOffset innerheightinnerwidthborder margin outerheightouterwidth(border margin) selfwindow Screen availHeight availWidth deviceXDPI deviceYDPI height width pixelDepth requestAnimationFrame ``` #### ###### dom (1) dom (2) dom (3) dom

```javascript
function clone(target) {
    if(typeof target === 'object') {
        let cloneTarget = Array.isArray(target) ? [] : {}
        for(const key in target) {
            cloneTarget[key] = clone(target[key])
        }
        return cloneTarget
    } else {
        return target
    }
}
```

```javascript
function clone(target, map = new Map()) {
    if (typeof target === 'object') {
        let cloneTarget = Array.isArray(target) ? [] : {};
        if (map.get(target)) {
            // mapvalue
            return map.get(target);
        }
        map.set(target, cloneTarget);
        for (const key in target) {
            cloneTarget[key] = clone(target[key], map);
        }
        return cloneTarget;
    } else {
        return target;
    }
};
```
#### isEquals()
```javascript
// 5.2 isEquals()
function isObject(obj) {
  return typeof obj === "object" && obj !== null
}
function isEqual(obj1,obj2){
    if(!isObject(obj1) || !isObject(obj2)){
        return obj1 === obj2
    }
    if(obj1 === obj2) {
        return true
    }
    const obj1Keys = Object.keys(obj1).length
    const obj2Keys = Object.keys(obj2).length
    if (obj1Keys !== obj2Keys) {
        return false
    }
    for (let i in obj1) {
        const res = isEqual(obj1[i],obj2[i])
        if(!res) {
            return false
        }
    }
    return true
} 
```
